document_data.caption: A map of the Pirate Isles showing Sarr in the south.
document_data.name: Sarr
document_data.mainbody: '''Sarr''' was a tiny island in the [[Pirate Isles]] on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.Geography: Sarr was found in the southern region of the Pirate Isles due south of [[Mirg Isle]] and [[Telfar]].
document_data.Description: A single ruined lighthouse sat on Sarr's eastern tip, crumbling and laying half-buried in the sand.
document_data.Inhabitants: The island was exposed to harsh storms approaching the Pirate Isles from the south, causing most pirates to ignore it.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Unbeknownst to the pirates, a magical artifact called the ''[[Beacon of Light]]'' was buried within the ruins of the lighthouse.
